title: UN Urges 'Restraint' From Law Enforcement After US Protester Deaths
summary_full: UN chief Antonio Guterres called Thursday for "restraint" from authorities towards protesters in the United States after immigration agents killed two US citizens this month demonstrating against deportation raids in Minneapolis.
